* **Building a better future:**  Focus on rebuilding trust and demonstrating honesty to potential customers.  This might involve offering more transparency about your process or exploring alternative ways to sell your products.

Don't let this experience discourage you. Use it as an opportunity to learn and improve. Focus on becoming a more reliable and trustworthy seller in the long run.
